references.paper_title: Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces the ResNet architecture, a fundamental building block in many modern object detection models, including those used in the paper for SAR object detection.

references.paper_title: You Only Look Once: Unified, Real-Time Object Detection
references.reason: This paper introduces the YOLO family of object detectors, which are known for their speed and efficiency and are commonly used in various object detection tasks, including SAR object detection.

references.paper_title: Focal Loss for Dense Object Detection
references.reason: This paper introduces the Focal Loss function, which addresses class imbalance issues in object detection, a common problem in SAR object detection datasets.

references.paper_title: Faster R-CNN: Towards Real-Time Object Detection with Region Proposal Networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the Faster R-CNN architecture, a popular and widely used two-stage object detection framework, whose backbone is often used as a starting point for adapting models to SAR imagery.

This paper introduces DETR, a novel transformer-based object detection framework that is becoming increasingly popular in the field, and is also explored within this paper as an approach for improving SAR object detection.
